page.title: 14Home life
page.content: This is an area of relatively low {unemployment}with both parents working.Home life is influenced to a large extent by the television,it is rare to find a home without a{T.V. set.A growing number of people also have{videos}and{computers. Other{entertainment}centres largely around visiting{grandparents}and relations,with occasional visits to the cinema,theatre,seaside or meals out usually at a local pub or cafe. {Sports}both for participants and spectators are varied -football, cricket,tennis,swimming, roller skating,cycle-riding,horse-riding to name a few. {Shopping}is important,most families going to Diss or Thetford for weekly groceries and to Norwich or Bury St Edmunds for other purchases, such as furniture or clothing.
